questions.question_text: Which three options are features of the Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: I'd say B-C-F. I don't think DCNM provides "authentication SERVICES". There is authentication to DCNM itself, but it's not "RADIUS/TACACS for other devices" (not "service").

Correct answer: B
Cisco TrustSec encryption has the same implications in the case of OTV over dark fiber as in vPC over dark fiber.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/solutions/Enterprise/Data_Center/DCI/4-0/EMC/implementation_guide/DCI4_EMC_IG/EMC_1.html

questions.question_text: Which Cisco product meets the LAN extension cryptography requirement in OTV over Dark Fiber scenario?
You are designing the access layer. Which three pinning configurations for a FEX port are valid? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Defines the number of uplinks. The default is 1. The range is from 1 to 4.

This command is only applicable if the Fabric Extender is connected to its parent switch using one or more statically pinned fabric interfaces. There can only be one port channel connection.
1 physical, 4 physical and 1 uplink port channel

choices.C: Demarcation point between static and dynamic routing protocols

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Select two items that represent features of the Aggregation layer in the Data Center 3-layer design. (Choose two)

choices.B: The device is a secondary vPC device.
choices.C: The device is a primary vPC device.
choices.A: The STP is disabled on the vPC peer device.
choices.D: There are 55 vPC domains configured on the device.
choices.E: The device is configured to act as an active gateway for packets destined for the MAC address of the peer device.
